item.title: Google Tweaks Its Plans for Google Video, Makes It Easier to Move to YouTube
item.description: Google Tweaks Its Plans for Google Video, Makes It Easier to Move to YouTube http://rww.to/gZcaXv
item.content:encoded: Google Tweaks Its Plans for Google Video, Makes It Easier to Move to YouTube http://rww.to/gZcaXv Last week, Google notified owners of video content on Google Video that the site would be officially shuttered, giving them what felt like very short notice on its closure. Effective April 29, videos would no longer be available for playback, and users had until May 13 to download content. Although Google Video hasn't allowed uploads since 2009, the site still contains almost 3 million videos according to Google Operating Systems. Many users complained that Google had made no easy way to port content over to YouTube. On Friday, Google announced that it was making some adjustments to its plans. It's... Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: readwriteweb.com

item.title: Easter Bunny and Egg Inspired Artworks | Naldz Graphics
item.description: New on NG: #Easter #Bunny and Egg Inspired Artworks http://bit.ly/elFk7c
item.content:encoded: New on NG: #Easter #Bunny and Egg Inspired Artworks http://bit.ly/elFk7c In many countries, Easter is symbolized by the Easter Bunny or Easter Hare. In the legend, the Easter bunny -who sometimes is depicted with clothes- brings baskets filled with colored eggs, candy and sometimes also toys to the homes of children before their the holiday. Easter eggs are the most common and most popular goodies that signifies the easter holidays. Various activites are done during this season to fully experience Springtime. Today, we are celebrating the Easter season with a collection of Easter Bunny and Eggs Inspired Artworks that will get you inspired. Check out these great showcase and let the child in you enjoy these inspiring artworks made by amazing designers. Cool interpretations of the cuddly easter bunny were made by the designers to bring light to a different personality of this great season. Happy Easter!!! Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: naldzgraphics.net

item.title: Magical Block Store: When Abstractions Fail Us « Joyeur
item.description: "Magical Block Store: When Abstractions Fail Us" @MarkMayo shares network storage system lessons learned: http://bit.ly/fziHUl #aws #ebs
item.content:encoded: "Magical Block Store: When Abstractions Fail Us" @MarkMayo shares network storage system lessons learned: http://bit.ly/fziHUl #aws #ebs Like anyone who has anything to do with the business of running applications attached to the Internet, I can’t help but feel uneasy and stressed when an outage as severe and impacting as the one Amazon Elastic Block Store has just experienced happens. The fact that Amazon is a competitor doesn’t matter. It just sucks for everyone. This post, however, isn’t about EBS. Not really. It’s about abstractions. In particular, the abstraction of “the disk.” Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: joyeur.com
